content: the sundowner beanie is a quick cozy crochet hat that uses a simple variation of double_crochet to create subtle x-stitches with great texture you ll work the brim body and crown all at once in sideways row so the whole hat comes together fast with no extra steps the pattern includes seven sizes ranging from preemie to adult large so you can make one for everyone it s an easy satisfying project you ll want to stitch more than once **this easy crochet winter hat pattern pdf includes 17 pages of helpful content** - a clear written pattern in seven sizes preemie baby toddler child tween adult small adult large - helpful instructional photos - invitation to our private community for pattern support **yarn requirements** this pattern uses category #4 worsted weight yarn like lion brand color theory or similar ✨ learn how to crochet sweaters that always fit using our c r a f t framework 1 1 https //makeanddocrew com/no-fail-garments-crochet-course/
